item.title: Short Form Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are a video content creation agency with a team of 14. We grow the personal brands of some of the biggest names in the online space through Instagram reels and TikTok.

We are searching for an experienced short form video editor to join the team full time and grow within our company for the long term.

* You must be fluent in English
* You must have examples of vertical short form videos in your portfolio
* You must have 3 years minimum experience editing

Please complete all of the questions inside this application to be considered:

Attach the link to your short form video portfolio in your application

Include the word Blue at the top of your application

item.title: Video Editor For Agency: Need Ongoing - Upwork
item.description:
Agency looking for a video editor we can partner with to make videos for our clients as needed. From video blogs to client testimonials we do it all. Including large events and proof of work concept. All footage will be taken by us and sent to you for video editing. We use DJI Pocket Pro 2, DJI Drone and cell phone sometimes taken by the client on the field.  

We also want someone who can add closed captioning as needed. Willing to pay for more experienced person. Want high end final products out of sometimes very poor footage. Must be willing to take creative freedom for best final products. Please send examples of your best projects!

Hourly Range: $35.00-$100.00

item.title: Product Use Video Creator for Medical Products - Upwork
item.description:
We are in need of a talented video creator who can help us produce high-quality product use videos for our medical products. These videos will be used to demonstrate the proper usage of our products in post-surgical operations. The ideal candidate will have experience in video production and a good understanding of medical procedures. Attention to detail and the ability to clearly communicate complex information through visuals is essential. This is an exciting opportunity to contribute to the healthcare industry and make a difference in patient care.

item.title: UGC Content Creation Coordinator - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a dedicated User-Generated Content (UGC) Manager to oversee and manage our network of content creators. The ideal candidate will be responsible for coordinating the creation of high-quality ads, testimonials, and about us videos for our agency. You will work full-time to ensure that all content is delivered according to our standards and within deadlines.

Key Responsibilities:
- Manage and coordinate a team of UGC creators to produce various types of content, including ads, testimonials, and about us videos.
- Review and provide feedback on content to ensure it meets quality standards and aligns with the provided scripts and guidelines.
- Communicate effectively with UGC creators to clarify project requirements and expectations.
- Monitor progress and ensure timely delivery of all content.
- Handle the recruitment, onboarding, and training of new UGC creators as needed.
- Maintain and update content production schedules.
- Troubleshoot and resolve any issues that arise during the content creation process.
- Work closely with other departments to align content with overall marketing strategies.

Requirements:
- Proven experience in managing content creation projects, preferably with user-generated content.
- Strong communication and organizational skills.
- Ability to provide clear and constructive feedback to content creators.
- Familiarity with video production and editing tools.
- Ability to handle multiple projects simultaneously and meet tight deadlines.
- Creative mindset with a keen eye for detail.
- Previous experience with BackStage is a plus.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 18:01 UTC
Category: General Virtual Assistance
Skills:Staff Recruitment & Management, Project Management, Creative Direction
Skills: Staff Recruitment & Management, Project Management, Creative Direction
Country: United States
click to apply

Video Editor and Animations Needed!!

Looking to partner with a video editor who knows and understands the video content landscape (TikTok, Youtube and Instagram Reels) to provide direction and editing of videos.

item.title: Cinematic Video Editor for Architectural Video Project - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled and experienced cinematic video editor who specializes in architectural video production. The project involves creating a captivating 1-minute video showcasing our production & events space from day to night. The footage will include both gimbal and drone shots to capture the essence and beauty of the space. Gimbal footage has been shot mainly at 60fps. As the video editor, you will be responsible for assembling the footage, enhancing the visual quality, adding effects, and ensuring a seamless flow.

    Skills required:
    - Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro) Excellent colorist
    - Strong understanding of cinematic techniques and storytelling
    - Ability to work with gimbal and drone footage
    - Attention to detail and the ability to deliver high-quality output
    - Add captivating music similar to example referenced below



PLEASE SEE LINK BELOW FOR STYLE EXAMPLE

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BWgMHzvWqOE



    Size: Medium
    Duration: 1 to 3 months
    Expertise: Expert

MUST SEND EXAMPLES OF PREVIOUS ARCHITECTURAL AND/OR REAL ESTATE VIDEOS TO BE CONSIDERED.

ONLY APPLY FOR JOB HERE VIA UPWORK NOT ON SOCIAL MEDIA CHANNELS TO BE CONSIDERED.

Budget: $350
Posted On: June 17, 2024 17:52 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Superior Video Designer & Ads Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are a Marketing & Consulting Agency seeking a superior Video Designer & Ads Creator to join our team. Your main responsibility will be to create advertising videos that go viral and increase lead generation for our clients. As a Video Designer, you should have a strong understanding of visual storytelling and be proficient in video editing software. Additionally, you should have a creative eye for designing engaging and impactful ads. The ideal candidate will also have experience with social media platforms and knowledge of current video marketing trends.



  Skills required:
  - Proficient in video editing software (e.g. Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
  - Strong understanding of visual storytelling
  - Creative eye for designing engaging ads
  - Knowledge of video marketing trends
  - Familiarity with social media platforms

  This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level Video Designer & Ads Creator with a proven track record of creating viral advertising videos.Proficiency in CapCut and AI tools.
Fluent in English, with excellent communication skills.
Ability to create videos similar to those on the following social media accounts:
Woosender YouTube
Woosender Instagram
Bigly Sales Instagram
Bigly Sales YouTube
Conduit Digital YouTube
Conduit Digital Instagram

Hourly Range: $6.00-$10.00

item.title: Full-Time VA Needed for Creating Talking Animation Images and editing youtube, tik tok and IG posts - Upwork
item.description:
Read the full description please

We are seeking a talented and creative Virtual Assistant to help us create engaging "talking animation images" for our Instagram pages, "Think and Grow Rich Secrets" and "Secrets of Success." This is a full-time position, with working hours based on US Central or Eastern time zones (preferably around 10 AM Central time until 6 PM Eastern time). Initially, the workload will be light but will increase over time.

Responsibilities:

Watch and follow the provided YouTube tutorial to create "talking animation images."
Use any video editing software of your choice to create and edit animation images.
Utilize Canva, Photoshop, Adobe, ChatGPT, and other AI tools for creating images, videos, and copy for posts.
Understand and utilize trending audio to edit videos that capture and retain viewers' attention.
Edit YouTube videos using green screen and DaVinci Resolve (or similar software) is a bonus.
Communicate and organize tasks using Google Docs and WhatsApp.
Requirements:

Proven experience in video editing and animation.
Proficiency with video editing software of your choice, as well as Canva, Photoshop, Adobe, and ChatGPT.
Strong creative and technical skills.
Ability to follow detailed instructions from the tutorial.
Excellent communication skills.
Understanding of trending audio and video editing techniques to keep viewers engaged.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience in creating content for social media platforms, especially Instagram.
Familiarity with personal development content is a plus.
Experience with YouTube video editing using green screen and DaVinci Resolve (or similar software).
Project Details:

This is a full-time position, starting with a lighter workload that will increase over time.
Working hours: 10 AM Central time to 6 PM Eastern time.
Please provide examples of previous work related to video editing or animation.
Mention "Creative Video VA" at the beginning of your proposal to confirm that you have read and understood the job requirements.

These are our two pages that we need help with ( you will create this kind of content for us)
https://www.instagram.com/manifestmoneymindsett/
https://www.instagram.com/thenewthoughtrevolution/

Budget: $25
Posted On: June 17, 2024 17:50 UTC
Category: General Virtual Assistance
Skills:CapCut, Video Editing, Graphic Design, 2D Animation, Adobe Photoshop, Video Post-Editing, Social Media Marketing, Instagram, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, DaVinci Resolve
Skills: CapCut, Video Editing, Graphic Design, 2D Animation, Adobe Photoshop, Video Post-Editing, Social Media Marketing, Instagram, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, DaVinci Resolve
Country: United States

item.title: Seeking Experienced Video Editor for Ongoing Social Media Projects - Upwork
item.description:
Description:

Are you a skilled video editor looking for a long-term collaboration opportunity? We are in search of a talented individual to join our team and assist with editing multiple videos for our social media channels over the next few months. These videos will primarily be short social posts intended for platforms like LinkedIn and Instagram, ranging from 30 to 3:00 minutes in length.

Responsibilities:

Edit multiple videos according to provided specifications.
Ensure videos are optimized for various social media platforms.
Incorporate text overlays, music, and other elements as needed.
Maintain consistency in branding and style across all videos.
Requirements:

Proven experience in video editing, with a strong portfolio showcasing prior work.
Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
Ability to work efficiently and meet deadlines.
Strong attention to detail and a creative eye for visual storytelling.
Excellent communication skills and ability to take direction.
Additional Information:

This is a remote position, and applicants from any location are welcome to apply.
The workload will vary, but we anticipate the need for editing multiple videos per week.
Compensation will be discussed based on experience and workload.

How to Apply:

If you're interested in joining our team as a video editor, please submit the following:

Your resume or a brief overview of your relevant experience.
A link to your portfolio or samples of previous video editing work.

Any additional information you believe would be helpful for us to know.

We look forward to reviewing your applications and finding the right candidate to collaborate with us on this exciting project! If you have any questions, feel free to reach out.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$12.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 17:46 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

Excellent communication skills and ability to take direction.
Additional Information:

This is a remote position, and applicants from any location are welcome to apply.
The workload will vary, but we anticipate the need for editing multiple videos per week.
Compensation will be discussed based on experience and workload.

How to Apply:

If you're interested in joining our team as a video editor, please submit the following:

Your resume or a brief overview of your relevant experience.
A link to your portfolio or samples of previous video editing work.

Any additional information you believe would be helpful for us to know.

We look forward to reviewing your applications and finding the right candidate to collaborate with us on this exciting project! If you have any questions, feel free to reach out.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$12.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 17:46 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States

item.title: Virtual assistant familiar with blog editing on Squarespace, Canva, and other copy & paste work. - Upwork
item.description:
⚠️ Do NOT contact me outside of Upwork.

Hi 👋🏼 My name's Fiona and I run https://thewildpixel.com which is a business about Human Design. If you've never heard of it, imagine if astrology and Myers-Briggs had a love child.

I'm starting a video blog, and I need someone to help me get through this content burst I'm going to have. I don't imagine the tasks would take more than 1-2 hours per week.

Some of the tasks will be:

- Uploading my images to Instagram from Canva and/or editing my Canva templates.

- Copy and pasting Instagram hashtags and descriptions.

- Compressing my images for my blog posts and editing the blog posts. You'll copy and paste the content, SEO, and add tags/categories (all will be given to you).

- Uploading my videos to YouTube and Thinkific.

- Scheduling my ConvertKit emails with the proper tags.

⚠️ You MUST already know how to use that software.

Logistics:

- I will communicate through Upwork, sometimes sending Loom videos, but often through text.

- My budget is $150 per MONTH. I plan on using up as much of that as possible, so if I'm not giving you enough work to cover it, let me know! If you are working so quickly you're unable to log much time, also let me know! We can increase your monthly so you're compensated fairly. For example, if you take 1 hour to do a task that takes someone else 3 hours, it makes no sense for you to be making less money.

- Your screen will be recorded for at least the first two months.

Other:

This is going to be a one-month trial just to make sure we work well together. We don't discriminate against your gender identity, age, race, orientation, etc.

All the love,
Fiona

Hourly Range: $15.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 17:46 UTC
Category: General Virtual Assistance
Skills:Canva, Editing & Proofreading, Squarespace, ConvertKit, Virtual Assistance
Skills: Canva, Editing & Proofreading, Squarespace, ConvertKit, Virtual Assistance
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Manager + Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video editor to join our team and create compelling video ads for our content management agency.

As a Video Editor, you will be responsible for editing and enhancing raw footage into engaging and high-converting video ads for Facebook & Instagram.

Your tasks will include selecting and organizing the best shots, trimming and rearranging clips, adding music and sound effects, and optimizing the final videos for maximum impact.

Key skills required:
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Strong understanding of social media platforms, particularly Facebook and Instagram
- Ability to create visually appealing and attention-grabbing video content
- Familiarity with influencer and content creator trends
- Excellent attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

This is a long-term project with potential to be fulltime. We are looking for an intermediate-level video editor who can bring our vision to life and help us increase brand awareness and drive conversions through compelling video ads.

Hourly Range: $4.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 17:41 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Commercial, Testimonial Video, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Video Post-Editing, Instagram, Facebook, Social Media Management, UGC
Skills: Video Commercial, Testimonial Video, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Video Post-Editing, Instagram, Facebook, Social Media Management, UGC
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Repair a YouTube channel - Upwork
item.description:
My Youtube channel  https://www.youtube.com/@top10techYT
which focuses on "top 10 tech" was once a great page and on it's way to monetization.  I hired a team to post videos three times a week and they ended up doing a terrible job.
There's all sorts of SEO problems, keywords that are in the description area and hashtags that are in the description area.
The channel is now a mess.
I need the description area  to have Description scores to be higher than 95 to 100.
I need someone who knows what they are doing to go in and edit all the bad SEO out and put good SEO in so I can resume posting videos and get the channel monetized.
Can you help?

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 17, 2024 17:36 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Video Editing, YouTube Marketing, Social Media Marketing, YouTube Development, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, YouTube Marketing, Social Media Marketing, YouTube Development, Video Post-Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: Video editor for videos about fashion design and fashion education - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

We are a fashion design agency that offers services in fashion design and we also sell digital fashion design templates for brands and designers. We are looking for an individual keen in aesthetics and knowledgeable in fashion design, fashion history - especially streetwear, and fashion at large to help us create appealing, educational, and informative videos for our social media platforms.

onthebiasdesign.com

Must be comfortable creating videos, have keen knowledge of the current fashion industry and video trends, and have good communication.

EXPERIENCE OR HIGH INTEREST IN FASHION PREFERED. Ex: you could be a clothing brand owner, fashion design student, or just a fashion enthusiast

For some examples of video content we have already created and would love to see more of, please see our Instagram @onthebiasdesign.

We need an individual who can handle working more independently in terms of content research and script writing. We are also looking for about 3 - 5 videos a week to start.

In terms of content style, we would like it to match the examples here but we are open to new ones as well. We can meet brainstorm more about the specific styles; we are open to experimentation.

We will provide assets to you to aid in your video creation.

Note: we will be scheduling and posting all video content - no management needed.

Please write us if you are interested.

Best,
Jack

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 17, 2024 17:33 UTC
Category: Social Media Strategy
Skills:Content Creation, Content Management, Social Media Management, Instagram, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Content, Video Editing
Skills: Content Creation, Content Management, Social Media Management, Instagram, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Content, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Marketing Assistant/Social Media Manager with Creative/Graphic Design Skills - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled social media manager who also has decent graphic design abilities and a little bit of interest in video editing.

The main responsibility will be managing and growing up to four CLIENTS.  

The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of various social media platforms, content creation, and community management. The ability to create engaging graphics and visual content is a must. Additionally, basic video editing skills will be required occasionally.

This is a great opportunity for someone who is passionate about social media and has a creative eye.

If you are organized, detail-oriented, and can work independently to meet deadlines, we would love to hear from you! We are a marketing agency that will help teach you the basics of what needs to be done, and you'll have us as support when needed. Clients will communicate with you via Slack & ONLY Slack.

You will have one manager, and a total of 4 clients tops. You are required to show up 5 days a week, and any work you do on the weekend is up to you.

The client can request you to do, research, execute additional marketing relevant tasks as well. As you are their Marketing Assistant as well as a Social Media Manager.

$500 is your monthly pay, total.


If of interest, please let me know why you would be interested in such a position. What qualifies you for this. And also about you, personally, who you are, what your goals are, where you live country wise, and your level of english. Things like that.

Thanks

Relevant Skills:
- Social media management
- Graphic design
- Content creation
- Community management
- Basic video editing

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 17, 2024 17:33 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Instagram, Facebook, Graphic Design, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing
Skills: Instagram, Facebook, Graphic Design, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor - Quick 30 seconds clips - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented video editor to create engaging 30-second clips for our social media platforms. The ideal candidate will have experience with simple text overlays, smooth transitions, and a keen eye for detail. You will be responsible for editing 2-5 short videos per week.

Responsibilities:
- Edit and produce 30-second video clips.
- Add simple text overlays and smooth transitions.
- Ensure high-quality output suitable for social media platforms.
- Deliver 2-5 videos per week consistently.

Requirements:
- Proven experience in video editing.
- Proficiency with video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
- Ability to work quickly and meet deadlines.
- Strong attention to detail and creativity.
- Good communication skills.

Preferred:
- Experience creating content for social media, especially Facebook.

Example of Desired Work:
[Facebook Ad Library Example](https://www.facebook.com/ads/library/?active_status=all&ad_type=all&country=ALL&view_all_page_id=169667650247797&search_type=page&media_type=all)

If you have a portfolio or examples of your previous work, please include them with your application. We look forward to seeing your creativity in action!

Hourly Range: $3.00-$7.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 17:31 UTC
Category: Video Editing

item.title: Video Editor - Safety Trainings - Upwork
item.description:
GotSafety.com needs video editors for safety training videos for our clients in many industries. Our production team films English/Spanish actors in front of a green screen, and our video editors create scenes and use text to go along with the script. Videos are between 5- 10 minutes long, depending on the subject.

Each safety lesson needs to have English and Spanish videos. We are looking for a long-term relationship with an editor that can finish multiple safety lessons each month. We currently have a full-time editor that is finishing 15 safety lessons each month (15 English videos, 15 Spanish)

Pay breakdown:
$300 per safety lesson. ($150 for English, $150 for Spanish).

MUST BE ABLE TO FINISH 1-2 SETS A WEEK

*this is an ongoing project, and we hope to find someone who can finish multiple sets of videos each week for our safety lessons.

Video editor needed:
• Creative and Hardworking.
• Experience in Adobe Premiere or Final Cut Pro.
• Experience editing professional videos preferred.
• Editors must find their own stock photo/video content.
• Must be able to make videos entertaining while still teaching employees how to be safe and compliant.
• Video editor needs to produce two videos of each safety lesson. One in English and the second one in Spanish.

Here are some examples of our current videos - please only apply if you feel like you can duplicate or improve up what we're currently doing! https://f.io/JSQy7qEZ

PLEASE INCLUDE SOME EXAMPLES OF YOUR  PAST WORK

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 17, 2024 17:20 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Color Grading, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Production, Special Effects, Chroma Keying
Skills: Color Grading, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Production, Special Effects, Chroma Keying
Country: United States
click to apply
